newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Geneva air cargo traffic down 4 pct in June.
newsitem.headline: Geneva air cargo traffic down 4 pct in June.

text.p: Geneva's Cointrin airport handled 5,677 tonnes of air cargo traffic in June, a decrease of four percent on the same month in 1995, airport authority figures show.
January-June 1996 air cargo throughput at Geneva totalled 32,604 tonnes, down 6.7 percent on 1995 levels.

June 1996 postal traffic handled at the airport decreased by 1.5 percent on the same month in 1995 to 730 tonnes while January-June volume also slipped by 1.5 percent, on the first six months of last year, to 4,402 tonnes. --Air Cargo Newsroom Tel+44-171-542-7706 Fax+171-44-542-5017
